title: Metaverse Mega Round-up: Universal & Facebook Moves, Weddings in Virtual Worlds
content: The metaverse train just keeps gathering steam. Here are just a few of the many new developments taking place in this fast-moving space as the week wraps up:

– Metaverse Spurs USD 100M In Weekly Land Plot NFT Sales

– Investing in the Metaverse: 4 Ways to Invest in Virtual Future
– Metaverse: Five Things to Know – and What It Could Mean For You

– Seoul to Launch ‘Metaverse’ Public Service Platform in 2022
